p: This paper is organised into four sections. In ‘‘ Introduction’’, we summarise key literature that has guided this research and contextualise the case study. ‘‘ Resilience: moving from theory to practice through co-production of knpwledge’’ details the research design and methodology used. In ‘‘ Context of application’’, we present the results and discuss how these results inter-relate to each of the communities where we conducted these workshops as well as present an overarching analysis of what these results mean in the context of bringing theory to practice. Finally, we conclude ‘‘ Materials and methods’’ with reflections, lessons, suggestions, and challenges for moving forward on the topic.
